titleInfo.title: Amy Grant and Vince Gill Christmas At The Ryman

mods.abstract: Three color window card (green, red, and white on brown) announcing Amy Grant and Vince Gill Christmas at the Ryman from November 28 to December 23. Poster features woodcuts of the Ryman Auditorium, trees, and snowflakes.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
